#summary Overview of installation options

= Introduction =

There are three ways you can install BigBlueButton

   * [BigBlueButtonVM Download BigBlueButton VM] (white belt)
   * [InstallationUbuntu Installing on Ubuntu (5 minutes)] (yellow belt)
   * [InstallingBigBlueButton Installing from source] (brown belt)

Regardless of the way you choose, there following page shows the configuration files:

   * [ConfigurationFiles Configuration Files]

Finally, if you are upgrading from a previous release, please see [ReleaseNotes Release Notes] on how to upgrade.
